Sinais Opticos SW HP

Available versions


  • ver. 5.0
  • ver. 5.4


Sinais Opticos SW HP

Description

Sinais ópticos (GBIC) para SW HP 5100

Overview

Template for SW 5100 with GBIC.

GBIC Information:

  • Optical signal level

  • Laser Temperature

  • Voltage and Current in the Laser

  • Wavelength

  • Manufacturer

Required to MIB:

HH3C-TRANSCEIVER-INFO-MIB

Author

Geraldo Jr

Macros used

There are no macros links in this template.

Template links

There are no template links in this template.

Discovery rules

There are no discovery rules in this template.

Items collected

|Name|Description|Type|Key and additional info| |—-|———–|—-|—-| |Fabricante (GBIC) $1|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|hh3cTransceiverVendorName<p>Update: 30</p>| |Máxima Potencia de RX $1|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|hh3cTransceiverMaxRXPower<p>Update: 30</p>| |Corrente do Laser|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|hh3cTransceiverBiasCurrent<p>Update: 30</p>| |Distancia de transferencia $1|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|hh3cTransceiverTransferDistance<p>Update: 30</p>| |Serial Number (GBIC) $1|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|hh3cTransceiverSerialNumber<p>Update: 30</p>| |Tensão do Laser|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|hh3cTransceiverVoltage<p>Update: 30</p>| |Temperatura $1|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|hh3cTransceiverTemperature<p>Update: 30</p>| |Diâmetro da Fibra $1|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|hh3cTransceiverFiberDiameterType<p>Update: 30</p>| |Minima Potencia de RX $1|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|hh3cTransceiverMinRXPower<p>Update: 30</p>| |Máxima Potencia de TX $1|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|hh3cTransceiverMaxTXPower<p>Update: 30</p>| |Potencia de RX $1|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|hh3cTransceiverCurRXPower<p>Update: 30</p>| |Potencia de TX $1|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|hh3cTransceiverCurTXPower<p>Update: 30</p>| |Minima Potencia de TX $1|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|hh3cTransceiverMinTXPower<p>Update: 30</p>| |Comprimento de Onda|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|hh3cTransceiverWaveLength<p>Update: 30</p>| |Tipo da Fibra $1|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|hh3cTransceiverHardwareType<p>Update: 30</p>| |Tipo de Transceiver (GBIC) $1|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|hh3cTransceiverType<p>Update: 30</p>| |Alarme no Transceiver (GBIC) $1|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|hh3cTransceiverDiagnostic<p>Update: 30</p>|

Triggers

There are no triggers in this template.
